name: CareConnect-ITK-ECD-Composition-1
title: Electronic Discharge Composition
description: This constrained composition resource represents an Emergency Care Discharge Document Header Composition.
copyright: Copyright Â© 2018 Health and Social Care Information Centre.  NHS Digital is the trading name of the Health and Social Care Information Centre.

binding.description: A set of codes to classify the type of document.
This list of codes represents the main clinical acts being documented. It uses a code from any vocabulary to describe the type of service event. The vocabulary SnomedCT is a preferred vocabulary.
A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which represents the type of section.
